snippet: “I cannot turn my back when the majority wants me to run for president,” Field Marshal Abdul-Fattah el-Sisi said, saying he would finalize procedures soon.
abstract: Egyptian Field Marshal Abdel Fattah el-Sisi edges closer to formalizing his all-but-declared candidacy for president, telling military academy audience that his plans will be finalized in days.
lead_paragraph: “I cannot turn my back when the majority wants me to run for president,” Field Marshal Abdul-Fattah el-Sisi said, saying he would finalize procedures soon.

headline.main: Egyptian General Moves to Formalize Presidential Bid
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Defense Minister Closes In on Presidential Run

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
